content.prompt: Which of the following best describes how judiciaries remain independent from other branches of government?

choices.label: Judiciaries overrule executive and legislative actions.
Judges are appointed by the president or prime minister.
Judiciaries routinely advise executives on economic policy.
Federal judges counsel lower-court judges on important cases.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
